title: Filipino Chicken Adobo
steps: Combine chicken, soy sauce, and garlic in a bowl. Marinate for at least 1 hour (longer is better).
Heat a pot and add cooking oil.
Pan-fry the marinated chicken 2 minutes per side.
Pour in remaining marinade with garlic and add water. Bring to boil.
Add bay leaves and peppercorns. Simmer 30 minutes until chicken is tender.
Add vinegar, stir, and cook 10 minutes.
Add sugar and salt. Stir and remove from heat.
notes: Volume conversions: 2 lbs chicken ≈ 907g, 4 tbsp soy sauce ≈ 60g, 6 tbsp vinegar ≈ 90g, 5 cloves garlic ≈ 25g, 1½ cups water ≈ 355g, 3 tbsp oil ≈ 42g, 1 tsp sugar ≈ 5g, ¼ tsp salt ≈ 2g, 1 tsp peppercorns ≈ 3g
Best served with warm white rice
